H3.text: where is geothermal energy used the most in the us. California

A4.text: The Geysers in Sonoma and Lake counties, California was developed into what is now the largest geothermal steam electrical plant in the world, at 1,517 megawatts.

A5.text: The Geysers has 1517 megawatt (MW) of active installed capacity with an average capacity factor of 63%.
